titles: A sermon preached vpon Sunday, beeing the twelfth of March. Anno. 1581, within the Tower of London in the hearing of such obstinate Papistes as then were prisoners there: by William Fulke Doctor in Diuinitie, and M. of Penbroke Hall in Cambridge.
author: Fulke, William, 1538-1589.
publisher: [At the three Cranes in the Vintree,] by Thomas Dawson, for George Bishop,
notes: Running title reads: A sermon preached, by M.D. Fulke.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
